headline: Does Ventura Ecosystem’s CTV Push Transform The Trade Desk’s Transparency Edge For Investors (TTD)?
summary: The Trade Desk recently expanded its Ventura connected TV platform with the launch of the Ventura Ecosystem, an industry collaboration that links global TV operating systems and streaming platforms with its monetization and transparency tools, initially including V and Nexxen. By tying together identity, direct supply connections and a shared monetization engine across connected TV partners, Ventura aims to make programmatic streaming ads more transparent and efficient for all participants...
